Plot Summary:
Set in the breathtaking islands of the South Pacific, Paradise Isle follows Gerald King (Warren Hull), a down-on-his-luck artist who becomes stranded after a shipwreck. Blind and disillusioned, Gerald is rescued by Ida (Movita), a kindhearted native island woman who brings him to her home and nurses him back to health. Despite cultural barriers and his initial despair, a tender connection forms between the two.

As Gerald recovers, Ida sacrifices much to restore his sight ‚Äî secretly seeking help from Dr. Matson (Pierre Watkin), a passing physician who can perform a sight-saving operation. Her love is tested when Gerald, once healed, faces a painful choice between returning to his old life or staying with the woman who saved him. sources.description:
Stars: Movita, Warren Hull, William B. Davidson
Director: Arthur Greville

A blind artist is on his way to Java when his ship sinks and he washes up on a tropical island. A beautiful native girl finds him and nurses him back to health.

metadata.Plot: A blind artist is on his way to Java to see a doctor about an operation to restore his sight when the ship sinks and he washes up on a tropical island. A native girl finds him and begins to nurse him back to health. However, the girl's boyfriend wants the artist out of the picture so he can have her to himself, and the only other white man on the island also wants the artist out or the picture so he can cheat the girl out of her prized possession, a large black pearl.
